original: @123b / /rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @123b / /rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya sapta sha ti ka n'a ma pradzny'a pa ra mi ta ma h'a ya na s'u tra /
analyzed: a'arya sapta sha ti ka n'a ma pradzny'a pa ra mi ta ma h'a ya na s'u tra /
translated: Arya-Sapta-Shatika-Nama-Prajnaparamita-Mahayanasutra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
translated: The Noble Sutra of the Perfection of Wisdom in Seven Hundred Lines, the Great Vehicle Sutra

original: bam po dang po /
analyzed: bam po dang po /
translated: First part

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas!

original: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
translated: Thus have I heard at one time

original: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
translated: The Blessed One was dwelling in Shravasti, in the Jeta Grove, in the garden of Anathapindika, together with a great assembly of one thousand monks.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha bgos pa sa ya thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag la 'di lta ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha bgos pa sa ya thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag la 'di lta ste /
translated: There were also one million bodhisattva mahasattvas, all of whom were fully armored and irreversible from unsurpassed and perfect awakening. They were:

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byams pa dang / spobs pa thams cad med dang / brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sa ya dang yang thabs cig go /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byams pa dang / spobs pa thams cad med dang / brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sa ya dang yang thabs cig go /
translated: the youthful Mañjuśrī, Maitreya, Sarva­nīvaraṇa­viṣkambhin, Akṣayamati, and so forth, together with a hundred thousand bodhisattvas.

original: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir skya rengs shar ba'i dus kyi tshe rang gi gnas nas byung @124a *//
analyzed: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir skya rengs shar ba'i dus kyi tshe rang gi gnas nas byung @124a *//
translated: Then, at dawn, Mañjuśrī, the youthful son, left his own abode in order to see, pay homage to, and serve the Tathāgata.

original: ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang gi sgo ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / pho brang gi sgo'i phyi rol tu 'dug go /
analyzed: ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang gi sgo ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / pho brang gi sgo'i phyi rol tu 'dug go /
translated: He went to the door of the Tathāgata’s palace and sat outside the door.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir rang gi gnas nas byung ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang ga la ba der song ngo //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir rang gi gnas nas byung ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang ga la ba der song ngo //
translated: Then the venerable Śāradvatīputra also left his own abode in order to see, pay homage to, and serve the Blessed One, and went to the Tathāgata’s palace.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa moo dgal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka ty'a ya'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa moo dgal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka ty'a ya'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang /
translated: Then the Venerable Pūrṇa Maitrāyaniputra, the Venerable Mahāmaudgalyāyana, the Venerable Mahākāśyapa, the Venerable Mahākātyāyana, the Venerable Mahākauṣṭhila,

original: de dag thams cad dang / gzhan yang nyan thos chen po rnams rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das kyi pho brang ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / phyogs gcig tu 'khod do;/
analyzed: de dag thams cad dang / gzhan yang nyan thos chen po rnams rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das kyi pho brang ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / phyogs gcig tu 'khod do;/
translated: all of them, and the other great hearers, each left their own places and went to the place where the Blessed One's palace was. When they arrived, they sat to one side.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos chen po rnams 'ongs shing lhags te 'dus par mkhyen nas bdag gi pho brang nas byung ste pho brang gi phyi rol gyi phyogs gcig tu gdan bting ba la bzhugs so //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos chen po rnams 'ongs shing lhags te 'dus par mkhyen nas bdag gi pho brang nas byung ste pho brang gi phyi rol gyi phyogs gcig tu gdan bting ba la bzhugs so //
translated: Then the Blessed One, knowing that the great hearers had come, assembled, and gathered, left his own palace and sat on a seat prepared outside the palace to one side.

original: bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Having sat down, the Blessed One, as if he knew, said to the venerable Śāradvatīputra:

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatīputra,

original: khyod ci'i phyir zhogs pas 'ongs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang gi sgo na 'dug /
analyzed: khyod ci'i phyir zhogs pas 'ongs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang gi sgo na 'dug /
translated: why have you come so early and are sitting at the door of the Tathāgata’s palace?”

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: When this was said, the venerable Śāradvatīputra said to the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: thams cad kyi thog ma nyid du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang gi chab @124b sgor mchis so //
analyzed: thams cad kyi thog ma nyid du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang gi chab @124b sgor mchis so //
translated: first of all, youthful Mañjuśrī was at the door of the Tathāgata’s palace.

original: bdag ni / bcom ldan 'das la blta bar 'tshal ba'i slad du slad kyis mchis so //
analyzed: bdag ni / bcom ldan 'das la blta bar 'tshal ba'i slad du slad kyis mchis so //
translated: I came later to see the Blessed One.”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One, as if he knew, said to youthful Mañjuśrī:

original: 'jam dpal / khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir thams cad kyi thog ma nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang gi sgo na 'dug pa bden nam /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir thams cad kyi thog ma nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang gi sgo na 'dug pa bden nam /
translated: Mañjuśrī, is it true that you are the first to be at the door of the Tathāgata's palace in order to see, to pay homage to, and to serve the Tathāgata?

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: When this was said, the youthful Mañjuśrī said to the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de de lta lags /
analyzed: de de lta lags /
translated: it is so.

original: bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: Well-Gone One,

original: de de lta lags te /
analyzed: de de lta lags te /
translated: it is so.

original: bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du thams cad kyi thog ma nyid du rang gi gnas nas byung ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang ga la ba der mchis nas phyogs gcig tu mchis so //
analyzed: bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du thams cad kyi thog ma nyid du rang gi gnas nas byung ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang ga la ba der mchis nas phyogs gcig tu mchis so //
translated: I was the first to leave my own abode in order to see, to pay homage to, and to serve the Tathāgata. I went to the Tathāgata's palace and remained there in one place.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di ltar / bdag ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar / bdag ni /
translated: it is because

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi bas ma ngoms pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi bas ma ngoms pa'i slad du'o //
translated: because I am not satisfied with seeing the Tathāgata, paying homage to him, and serving him.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di ltar / bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du mchis pa de yang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar / bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du mchis pa de yang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du ste /
translated: in this way, I have come to see the Tathāgata, pay homage to him, and serve him for the sake of all beings.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba ji ltar bdag gis mthong ba dang / ji ltar bdag phyag @125a *//
analyzed: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba ji ltar bdag gis mthong ba dang / ji ltar bdag phyag @125a *//
translated: if seeing the Tathāgata, paying homage to him, and serving him is as I see it, as I pay homage,

original: bgyid pa dang / ji ltar bdag bsnyen bkur bgyid pa de ltar blta bar bgyi'o //🔽de ltar phyag bgyi'o //
analyzed: bgyid pa dang / ji ltar bdag bsnyen bkur bgyid pa de ltar blta bar bgyi'o // de ltar phyag bgyi'o //
translated: and as I serve, then I should see in that way.🔽I should pay homage in that way.

original: de ltar bsnyen bkur bgyi'o //
analyzed: de ltar bsnyen bkur bgyi'o //
translated: I should serve in that way.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In that way,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba nas bsnyen bkur bgyis pa'i bar du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba nas bsnyen bkur bgyis pa'i bar du 'gyur ro //
translated: I will have seen the Tathāgata, paid homage to him, and served him.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: bdag ni / sems can thams cad kyi slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba lags so //
analyzed: bdag ni / sems can thams cad kyi slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba lags so //
translated: I am here to see the Tathāgata for the sake of all sentient beings.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: 'jam dpal / de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar blta /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar blta /
translated: Mañjuśrī, how should one see the Tathāgata?

original: 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa /🔽mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin nyid kyi rnam pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i rnam par de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin nyid kyi rnam pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i rnam par de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o //
translated: Mañjuśrī replied:🔽One should see the Tathāgata in the aspect of suchness and the aspect of non-conceptuality, by way of non-apprehension.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la mi skye ba'i rnam par blta ba nas dngos po ma mchis pa'i rnam pa'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la mi skye ba'i rnam par blta ba nas dngos po ma mchis pa'i rnam pa'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o //
translated: One should see the Tathāgata in the aspect of non-arising, up to the aspect of non-existence.

original: de bzhin nyid la kun nas 'byung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la kun nas 'byung ba ma yin te /
translated: Suchness does not arise.

original: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o //
translated: Thus, one should see the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin nyid ni /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni /
translated: Suchness

original: 'byung ba'ang ma lags /
analyzed: 'byung ba'ang ma lags /
translated: is neither arising

original: 'jig pa'ang ma lags te /
analyzed: 'jig pa'ang ma lags te /
translated: nor ceasing.

original: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o //
translated: Thus, one should see the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin ni /
analyzed: de bzhin ni /
translated: Suchness

original: yul na mi gnas /
analyzed: yul na mi gnas /
translated: does not abide in a place,

original: phyogs na mi gnas te /
analyzed: phyogs na mi gnas te /
translated: It does not abide in any direction.

original: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o //
translated: Thus should the Tathāgata be seen.

original: de bzhin nyid ni /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni /
translated: Thusness

original: 'das ma lags /🔽ma 'ongs pa ma lags /
analyzed: 'das ma lags / ma 'ongs pa ma lags /
translated: is not past,🔽is not future,

original: da ltar byung ba ma lags te /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba ma lags te /
translated: and is not present.

original: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o //
translated: Thus should the Tathāgata be seen.

original: de bzhin nyid ni /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni /
translated: Thusness

original: gnyis kyis rab tu skye ba ma lags /
analyzed: gnyis kyis rab tu skye ba ma lags /
translated: is not produced by duality

original: gnyis su ma mchis pas rab @125b tu phye ba yang ma lags te /
analyzed: gnyis su ma mchis pas rab @125b tu phye ba yang ma lags te /
translated: and is not distinguished by nonduality.

original: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o //
translated: Thus should the Tathāgata be seen.

original: de bzhin nyid ni /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni /
translated: Thusness

original: kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba ma lags /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba ma lags /
translated: is not defiled

original: rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba ma lags te /
analyzed: rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba ma lags te /
translated: and is not purified.

original: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o //
translated: Thus should the Tathāgata be seen.

original: de bzhin nyid ni /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni /
translated: Thusness

original: mi skye mi 'gag pa ste /🔽de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: mi skye mi 'gag pa ste / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o //
translated: is not produced and is not destroyed.🔽Thus should the Tathāgata be seen.

original: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / phyag bgyis pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / phyag bgyis pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, one will see the Tathāgata, pay homage to him, and serve him.”

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: The Blessed One said to Mañjuśrī Kumārabhūta,

original: 'jam dpal / khyod kyis de ltar bltas na; ci zhig mthong /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / khyod kyis de ltar bltas na; ci zhig mthong /
translated: “Mañjuśrī, when you look in that way, what do you see?”

original: 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa /
translated: Mañjuśrī replied,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: bdag gis de ltar bltas na /
analyzed: bdag gis de ltar bltas na /
translated: when I look in that way,

original: ci yang mthong ba ma mchis so //
analyzed: ci yang mthong ba ma mchis so //
translated: I do not see anything at all.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de bzhin du bdag gis chos gang yang skye ba yang ma mthong /
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag gis chos gang yang skye ba yang ma mthong /
translated: in the same way, I do not see any phenomena arising

original: 'gag pa yang ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'gag pa yang ma mthong ngo //
translated: or ceasing.”

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra ra dva ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra ra dva ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the venerable Śāradvatīputra said to Mañjuśrī Kumārabhūta,

original: 'jam dpal / khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la de ltar mthong ba dang / de ltar bsnyen bkur byas pa gang yin pa dang / khyod kyis byams pa chen po sems can thams cad la nye bar gnas kyang khyod la sems can du dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la de ltar mthong ba dang / de ltar bsnyen bkur byas pa gang yin pa dang / khyod kyis byams pa chen po sems can thams cad la nye bar gnas kyang khyod la sems can du dmigs pa dang /
translated: “Mañjuśrī, you have seen the Thus-Gone One in that way and have served him in that way, and you have great love for all beings. However, you do not apprehend any beings.

original: sems can du mngon par zhen pa ci yang med cing /
analyzed: sems can du mngon par zhen pa ci yang med cing /
translated: You have no attachment to any sentient being at all,

original: sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir zhugs kyang khyod la sems can du mngon par zhen pa gang yang mi @126a *//
analyzed: sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir zhugs kyang khyod la sems can du mngon par zhen pa gang yang mi @126a *//
translated: and although you have set out to lead all sentient beings to complete nirvāṇa, you have no attachment to any sentient being.

original: 'byung ba dang / khyod mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i tshul dang / sgyid lug pa med pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi ched du go cha bgos pa de ni /
analyzed: 'byung ba dang / khyod mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i tshul dang / sgyid lug pa med pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi ched du go cha bgos pa de ni /
translated: You have donned this armor for the sake of all sentient beings in a way that is free of apprehending anything, in a way that is free of things, and in a way that is free of discouragement.

original: khyod dka' ba byed pa'o //
analyzed: khyod dka' ba byed pa'o //
translated: This is your difficult task.”

original: de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: When this had been said, Mañjuśrī Kumārabhūta said to the venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: btsun pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te /
analyzed: ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te /
translated: it is just as you have said.

original: sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir go cha 'di yang bgos te /
analyzed: sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir go cha 'di yang bgos te /
translated: I have donned this armor in order to lead all sentient beings to complete nirvāṇa,

original: bdag la sems can du dmigs pa dang / sems can la mngon par zhen pa gang yang med do; ;btsun pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
analyzed: bdag la sems can du dmigs pa dang / sems can la mngon par zhen pa gang yang med do; ;btsun pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: go cha de ni /
analyzed: go cha de ni /
translated: this armor is not donned with the thought,

original: ji ltar bdag gis sems can gyi khams dbri ba'am gang bar bya zhes de ltar ma bgos so //
analyzed: ji ltar bdag gis sems can gyi khams dbri ba'am gang bar bya zhes de ltar ma bgos so //
translated: ‘I will increase or decrease the realm of sentient beings.’

original: btsun pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /🔽yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung ste /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu / yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung ste /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gal te sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re na gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te /
analyzed: gal te sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re na gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te /
translated: suppose that in each buddhafield there were as many blessed buddhas as there are grains of sand in the river Ganges.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so nas nyin mtshan du chos ston te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so nas nyin mtshan du chos ston te /
translated: And suppose that each of those thus-gone ones were to teach the Dharma day and night,

original: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par bzhugs par gyur la /
analyzed: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par bzhugs par gyur la /
translated: and that they were to remain for eons as numerous as the grains of sand in the river Ganges.

original: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bstan pa re res sems can ji snyed btul ba de snyed kyi sems can de bzhin gshegs pa re res chos bstan pa re res btul bar gyur du zin kyang sems can gyi khams
analyzed: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bstan pa re res sems can ji snyed btul ba de snyed kyi sems can de bzhin gshegs pa re res chos bstan pa re res btul bar gyur du zin kyang sems can gyi khams
translated: Even if each of the blessed buddhas, as numerous as the grains of sand in the Ganges River, were to tame as many beings as there are in the realms of beings with each teaching of the Dharma,

original: la bri ba'am gang par mngon pa med do //
analyzed: la bri ba'am gang par mngon pa med do //
translated: the realms of beings would not be seen to diminish or increase.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe @126b na; sems can dben pa dang / sems can sems can ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe @126b na; sems can dben pa dang / sems can sems can ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Why is this? Because beings are isolated, and because beings are not beings.

original: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: sems can gyi khams ni /
analyzed: sems can gyi khams ni /
translated: the realms of beings

original: bri ba'am gang bar mi mngon no //
analyzed: bri ba'am gang bar mi mngon no //
translated: are not seen to diminish or increase.

original: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: When this was said, the venerable Śāradvatīputra said to the youthful Mañjuśrī,

original: 'jam dpal / gal te sems can dben pa dang / sems can sems can ma yin pa'i phyir sems can gyi khams bri ba dang / gang bar mngon na /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / gal te sems can dben pa dang / sems can sems can ma yin pa'i phyir sems can gyi khams bri ba dang / gang bar mngon na /
translated: “Mañjuśrī, if the realms of beings are isolated, and because beings are not beings, the realms of beings are not seen to diminish or increase,

original: 'o na byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas su la chos ston /
analyzed: 'o na byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas su la chos ston /
translated: “Well then, after fully awakening to perfect buddhahood, to whom will you teach the Dharma?”

original: de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: When this was said, the youthful Mañjuśrī said to the venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gang gi tshe sems can shin tu mi dmigs pa de'i tshe su zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya /
analyzed: gang gi tshe sems can shin tu mi dmigs pa de'i tshe su zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya /
translated: when sentient beings are not even slightly observable, who will fully awaken?

original: su la chos bstan par bya /
analyzed: su la chos bstan par bya /
translated: To whom will the Dharma be taught?

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di ltar chos thams cad shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar chos thams cad shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is because all phenomena are not even slightly observable.”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;'jam dpal /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;'jam dpal /
translated: Then the Blessed One said to the youthful Mañjuśrī,

original: gang gi tshe chos thams cad shin tu mi dmigs pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe chos thams cad shin tu mi dmigs pa de'i tshe /
translated: “Mañjuśrī, when all phenomena are not even slightly observable,

original: ci / sems can du'ang 'dogs sam /
analyzed: ci / sems can du'ang 'dogs sam /
translated: do you designate them as sentient beings?

original: yang gal te 'jam dpal khyod la 'ga' zhig sems can ji snyed yod ces de skad 'dri na /
analyzed: yang gal te 'jam dpal khyod la 'ga' zhig sems can ji snyed yod ces de skad 'dri na /
translated: “Mañjuśrī, if someone were to ask you, ‘How many sentient beings are there?’,

original: de la khyod kyis ji skad bya /
analyzed: de la khyod kyis ji skad bya /
translated: what would you say to them?”

original: 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa /
translated: Mañjuśrī replied,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: de skad 'dri ba de la bdag gis 'di skad du /
analyzed: de skad 'dri ba de la bdag gis 'di skad du /
translated: if someone were to ask me that, I would say,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ji snyed pa de snyed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ji snyed pa de snyed do //
translated: ‘There are as many as there are phenomena of awakening.’

original: zhes @127a *// bgyi'o; ;bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: zhes @127a *// bgyi'o; ;bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gal te yang sems can gyi khams kyi tshad ji tsam zhes 'dri na /
analyzed: gal te yang sems can gyi khams kyi tshad ji tsam zhes 'dri na /
translated: if someone were to ask me, ‘What is the extent of the realm of sentient beings?’,

original: de skad 'dri ba de la bdag gis 'di skad du /
analyzed: de skad 'dri ba de la bdag gis 'di skad du /
translated: if someone were to ask me that, I would say,

original: sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi tshad ji tsam pa de tsam mo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi tshad ji tsam pa de tsam mo //
translated: ‘It is the same as the extent of the domain of the buddhas.’

original: zhes bgyi'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: zhes bgyi'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: 'jam dpal / khyod la gal te yang la la zhig 'di skad du /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / khyod la gal te yang la la zhig 'di skad du /
translated: “Mañjuśrī, if someone were to ask you,

original: sems can gyi khams gang du gtogs zhes 'dri na /
analyzed: sems can gyi khams gang du gtogs zhes 'dri na /
translated: ‘To which realm of sentient beings do they belong?’,

original: de la khyod kyis ji skad bya /
analyzed: de la khyod kyis ji skad bya /
translated: what would you say to them?”

original: 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa /
translated: Mañjuśrī replied,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: de skad 'dri ba de la bdag gis 'di skad du /
analyzed: de skad 'dri ba de la bdag gis 'di skad du /
translated: If someone were to ask me, In what is the inconceivable non-arising included?

original: skye ba med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang du gtogs par gtogs so //
analyzed: skye ba med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang du gtogs par gtogs so //
translated: I would say, It is included in the realm of non-arising.

original: zhes bgyi'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽'dzam dpal / gal te yang la la zhig khyod la 'di skad du /
analyzed: zhes bgyi'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / 'dzam dpal / gal te yang la la zhig khyod la 'di skad du /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: sems can gyi khams ci la gnas zhes 'dri na /
analyzed: sems can gyi khams ci la gnas zhes 'dri na /
translated: Mañjuśrī, if someone were to ask you, In what does the realm of sentient beings abide?

original: de la khyod kyis ji skad bya /
analyzed: de la khyod kyis ji skad bya /
translated: what would you say to them?

original: 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa /
translated: Mañjuśrī replied:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de skad 'dri ba de la bdag gis 'di skad du /
analyzed: de skad 'dri ba de la bdag gis 'di skad du /
translated: if someone were to ask me that,

original: skye ba med pa'i khams ci la gnas pa de la sems can gyi khams kyang gnas so //
analyzed: skye ba med pa'i khams ci la gnas pa de la sems can gyi khams kyang gnas so //
translated: I would say, In whatever the realm of non-arising abides, the realm of sentient beings also abides.

original: zhes bgyi'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: zhes bgyi'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: 'jam dpal / khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa de'i tshe ci la gnas te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa de'i tshe ci la gnas te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom /
translated: Mañjuśrī, when you cultivate the perfection of wisdom, in what do you abide to cultivate the perfection of wisdom?

original: 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa /
translated: Mañjuśrī replied:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gang gi tshe bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'i tshe mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @127b sgom lags so //
analyzed: gang gi tshe bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'i tshe mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @127b sgom lags so //
translated: When I cultivate the perfection of wisdom, I cultivate the perfection of wisdom without abiding anywhere.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: 'jam dpal / mi gnas pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom du yang ci yod /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / mi gnas pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom du yang ci yod /
translated: Mañjuśrī, how can you cultivate the perfection of wisdom without abiding anywhere?

original: 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa /
translated: Mañjuśrī replied:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gang ci la yang mi gnas pa de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so //
analyzed: gang ci la yang mi gnas pa de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so //
translated: not abiding anywhere is itself the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: 'jam dpal / khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa de'i tshe khyod kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang 'phel ba'am 'bri bar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa de'i tshe khyod kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang 'phel ba'am 'bri bar 'gyur /
translated: Mañjuśrī, when you cultivate the perfection of wisdom, do your roots of virtue increase or decrease?

original: 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa /
translated: Mañjuśrī replied:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de'i tshe bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba'am 'bri bar 'gyur ba ci yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: de'i tshe bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba'am 'bri bar 'gyur ba ci yang ma mchis so //
translated: at that time, my roots of virtue neither increase nor decrease.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gang la chos 'ga' zhig 'phel ba'am 'dri ba mchis na /
analyzed: gang la chos 'ga' zhig 'phel ba'am 'dri ba mchis na /
translated: If there were any dharma that increased or decreased,

original: de ni / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ma lags te /
analyzed: de ni / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ma lags te /
translated: that would not be the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽gang chos gang yang chos 'ga' zhig 'phel ba'i slad du'am /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / gang chos gang yang chos 'ga' zhig 'phel ba'i slad du'am /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'bri ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa de ni /
analyzed: 'bri ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa de ni /
translated: if any dharma were to remain for the sake of increasing or decreasing any dharma,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ma lags par rig par bgyi'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ma lags par rig par bgyi'o //
translated: that would not be the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gang so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang mi spong la /
analyzed: gang so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang mi spong la /
translated: if one does not abandon the dharmas of ordinary beings

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang mi len pa de ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang mi len pa de ni /
translated: and does not adopt the dharmas of the Buddhas,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so //
translated: that is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di ltar / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bsgom pa ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bsgom pa ni /
translated: because the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom

original: chos gang spang ba'am blang bar dmigs pas chos gang la yang mi gnas pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: chos gang spang ba'am blang bar dmigs pas chos gang la yang mi gnas pa'i slad du'o //
translated: does not abide in any dharma by observing any dharma to be abandoned or adopted.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gang 'khor ba'i skyon du yang mi mchi zhing /🔽mya ngan las 'das pa'i @128a *//
analyzed: gang 'khor ba'i skyon du yang mi mchi zhing / mya ngan las 'das pa'i @128a *//
translated: It is not a fault of saṃsāra,

original: yon tan du yang mi mchib  de /
analyzed: yon tan du yang mi mchib  de /
translated: and it is not a good quality of nirvāṇa.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so //🔽de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so // de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: That is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one asks why, Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: it is because

original: 'di ltar / 'khor ba nyid kyang mi mthong na /🔽'khor ba'i skyon lta smos kyang mi 'tshal /
analyzed: 'di ltar / 'khor ba nyid kyang mi mthong na / 'khor ba'i skyon lta smos kyang mi 'tshal /
translated: if one does not see saṃsāra itself,🔽then one does not see the faults of saṃsāra, let alone the good qualities of nirvāṇa.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If one does not observe nirvāṇa itself,

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te /
translated: then one does not see the good qualities of nirvāṇa, let alone the faults of saṃsāra.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽gang chos gang la yang blang ba'am /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / gang chos gang la yang blang ba'am /
translated: Blessed One,🔽that which does not take up,

original: bzung ba'am / dor ba ma mchis pa de /
analyzed: bzung ba'am / dor ba ma mchis pa de /
translated: grasp, or reject any dharma

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so //
translated: is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gang chos gang la yang 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba mi dmigs pa de /
analyzed: gang chos gang la yang 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba mi dmigs pa de /
translated: that which does not observe the decrease or increase of any dharma

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one asks why, Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: it is because

original: skye ba ma mchis pa la 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: skye ba ma mchis pa la 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o //
translated: Because non-arising is without decrease and increase.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gang de ltar bsgom pa de /
analyzed: gang de ltar bsgom pa de /
translated: one who meditates in this way

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so //
translated: is meditating on the perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽gang chos gang yang skye ba'am /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / gang chos gang yang skye ba'am /
translated: Blessed One,🔽one who does not cause the arising or cessation

original: 'gag par mi bgyid pa de /
analyzed: 'gag par mi bgyid pa de /
translated: of any dharma

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so //
translated: is meditating on the perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽gang chos gang la yang 'grib pa'am /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / gang chos gang la yang 'grib pa'am /
translated: Blessed One,🔽one who does not cause the decrease or increase

original: rgyas par mi bgyid pa de /
analyzed: rgyas par mi bgyid pa de /
translated: of any dharma

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags te /
translated: is meditating on the perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gang de ltar bsgom pa de /
analyzed: gang de ltar bsgom pa de /
translated: one who meditates in this way

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so //
translated: is meditating on the perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gzhan yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos @128b la yang mi smon cing nyi tshe ba la mi smon gyi /
analyzed: gzhan yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos @128b la yang mi smon cing nyi tshe ba la mi smon gyi /
translated: furthermore, one does not aspire to inconceivable dharmas or to limited ones,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gang la smon pa dang / gang gis smon ba de nyid ma mchis pa de /
analyzed: gang la smon pa dang / gang gis smon ba de nyid ma mchis pa de /
translated: The one who wishes for something and by whom something is wished for does not exist.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags te /
translated: This is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das; de ltar bsgoms na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das; de ltar bsgoms na /
translated: Blessed One, when cultivated in this way,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so //
translated: it is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa ni /🔽'di ltar / chos 'di dag ni /

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa ni / chos gang yang mchog ces bya ba'am /

original: tha ma zhes mi rtog go /
analyzed: tha ma zhes mi rtog go /

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /

original: tha ma ma mchis te /
analyzed: tha ma ma mchis te /

original: de ltar bsgoms na /
analyzed: de ltar bsgoms na /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das //

analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa yin par khyod kyis shes par gyis shig /
translated: are abiding on the irreversible level.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas mos te mi skrag /
analyzed: gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas mos te mi skrag /
translated: those who, on hearing this teaching of the transcendent perfection of wisdom, have faith in it, and are not terrified,

original: mi dngang / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dang de dag ni /
analyzed: mi dngang / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dang de dag ni /
translated: not fearful, and do not become fearful,

original: sbyin bdag dam par 'gyur ba /
analyzed: sbyin bdag dam par 'gyur ba /
translated: will become the most excellent of benefactors,

original: sbyin bdag chen por 'gyur /
analyzed: sbyin bdag chen por 'gyur /
translated: they will become great benefactors,

original: spyin bdag khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spyin bdag khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur ro //
translated: they will become pre-eminent benefactors.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: de dang de dag ni /🔽tshul khrims phun sum tshogs par 'gyur /
analyzed: de dang de dag ni / tshul khrims phun sum tshogs par 'gyur /
translated: they will become those🔽who are perfect in their ethical discipline,

original: tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i mchog tu 'gyur /
analyzed: tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i mchog tu 'gyur /
translated: they will become the most ethical,

original: tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur /
analyzed: tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur /
translated: they will be especially exalted in terms of morality;

original: tshul khrims kyi yon tan gyi lam rnyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi yon tan gyi lam rnyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: they will find the path of the qualities of morality.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas mos te mi skrag /
analyzed: gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas mos te mi skrag /
translated: those who, having heard this teaching on the perfection of wisdom, will have faith in it,🔽will not be afraid,

original: mi dngang / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dang de dag ni /
analyzed: mi dngang / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dang de dag ni /
translated: will not be terrified, and will not be gripped by terror,

original: bzod pa'i mchog dang / brtson 'grus kyi mchog dang / bsam gtan gyi mchog dang / mtshungs pa med pa'i shes rab kyi mchog dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bzod pa'i mchog dang / brtson 'grus kyi mchog dang / bsam gtan gyi mchog dang / mtshungs pa med pa'i shes rab kyi mchog dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: they will have the highest patience, the highest diligence, the highest concentration, and the highest wisdom, which is unequaled.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,🔽those bodhisattva great beings who, having heard this teaching on the perfection of wisdom,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos te mi skrag /🔽mi dngang / dngang bar @134a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos te mi skrag / mi dngang / dngang bar @134a *//
translated: will not be afraid,

original: mi 'gyur ba de dag ni /
analyzed: mi 'gyur ba de dag ni /
translated: will not be terrified, and will not be gripped by terror,

original: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i bar du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i bar du 'gyur ro //
translated: they will have the wisdom of omniscience, endowed with the most sublime of all aspects.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: The Blessed One said to youthful Mañjuśrī:

original: 'jam dpal / khyod kyis don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / khyod kyis don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na /
translated: “Mañjuśrī, what is the meaning that you see

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'dod /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'dod /
translated: that you do not wish to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?”

original: 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa /
translated: Mañjuśrī replied:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: gal te bdag byang chub tu zhugs na ni /
analyzed: gal te bdag byang chub tu zhugs na ni /
translated: if I were to enter awakening,

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: then

original: bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'tshal na /
analyzed: bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'tshal na /
translated: I would wish to fully awaken,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: but, Blessed One,

original: bdag ni / byang chub tu smon pa ma lags so //
analyzed: bdag ni / byang chub tu smon pa ma lags so //
translated: I do not aspire to awakening.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang lags pa de byang chub nyid do //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang lags pa de byang chub nyid do //
translated: Awakening itself is youthful Mañjuśrī.

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: ” When he had said that, the Blessed One said to youthful Mañjuśrī:🔽“Mañjuśrī,

original: 'jam dpal / khyod zab mo zab pa'i gnas 'di lta bu 'di ston pa legs so //
analyzed: 'jam dpal / khyod zab mo zab pa'i gnas 'di lta bu 'di ston pa legs so //
translated: “Mañjuśrī, it is excellent that you have taught this profound topic.

original: legs so // 'di ltar /
analyzed: legs so // 'di ltar /
translated: It is excellent.

original: khyod ni / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa ste /
analyzed: khyod ni / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa ste /
translated: You have served the victorious ones of the past,

original: mi dmigs par tshangs par spyod pa yun ring du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs par tshangs par spyod pa yun ring du spyod pa'o //
translated: and you have practiced pure conduct for a long time without apprehending anything.”

original: 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa /
translated: Mañjuśrī said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: gal te bdag mi dmigs par spyod pa lags na ni /
analyzed: gal te bdag mi dmigs par spyod pa lags na ni /
translated: if I were to practice without apprehending anything,

original: chos thob pa nyid du 'gyur ba lags so //
analyzed: chos thob pa nyid du 'gyur ba lags so //
translated: I would attain the Dharma.”

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / @134b bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / @134b bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: When he had said this, the Blessed One said to youthful Mañjuśrī,

original: 'jam dpal / khyod kyis nga'i nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa 'di dag mthong ngam /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / khyod kyis nga'i nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa 'di dag mthong ngam /
translated: “Mañjuśrī, do you see my perfect hearers?”

original: 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa /
translated: Mañjuśrī said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: mthong lags so //
analyzed: mthong lags so //
translated: I do see them.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: ji ltar ci 'dra bar mthong /
analyzed: ji ltar ci 'dra bar mthong /
translated: “How do you see them?”

original: 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa /
translated: Mañjuśrī said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: ji ltar so so'i skye bor mi mthong ba dang / slob par mi mthong ba dang / mi slob par mi mthong ba dang / mthong ba yang ma mchis /
analyzed: ji ltar so so'i skye bor mi mthong ba dang / slob par mi mthong ba dang / mi slob par mi mthong ba dang / mthong ba yang ma mchis /
translated: Just as one does not see the ordinary person, one does not see the one in training, and one does not see the one beyond training.

original: ma mthong ba yang ma mchis pa de ltar mthong ngo //
analyzed: ma mthong ba yang ma mchis pa de ltar mthong ngo //
translated: One sees in such a way that one does not see, and yet one sees.

original: 'di ltar mang du yang mi mthong ba dang / nyung du yang mi mthong ba dang / dul bar yang mi mthong ba dang / ma dul bar yang mi mthong ba de ltar mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar mang du yang mi mthong ba dang / nyung du yang mi mthong ba dang / dul bar yang mi mthong ba dang / ma dul bar yang mi mthong ba de ltar mthong ngo //
translated: One sees in such a way that one does not see many, and one does not see few. One does not see disciplined, and one does not see undisciplined.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the venerable Śāradvatīputra said to Mañjuśrī­kumāra­bhūta,

original: 'jam dpal / khyod kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams de ltar mthong na /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / khyod kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams de ltar mthong na /
translated: “Mañjuśrī, when you see the followers of the Śrāvakayāna in that way,

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams khyod kyis ji ltar mthong /
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams khyod kyis ji ltar mthong /
translated: how do you see the followers of the vehicle of the perfectly complete Buddha?”

original: 'jam dpal gyis smras pa /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyis smras pa /
translated: Mañjuśrī replied,

original: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i chos kyang rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i chos kyang rjes su mi mthong /
translated: He does not see any phenomenon called ‘bodhisattva.’

original: byang chub tu zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyang rjes su mi mthong /🔽byang chub kyi phyir spyod do //🔽zhes bya ba'i chos kyang rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: byang chub tu zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyang rjes su mi mthong / byang chub kyi phyir spyod do // zhes bya ba'i chos kyang rjes su mi mthong /
translated: He does not see any phenomenon called ‘one who has entered into awakening.’🔽He does not see any phenomenon called ‘one who practices for the sake of awakening.’

original: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i chos kyang rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i chos kyang rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
translated: He does not see any phenomenon called ‘perfect buddha.’

original: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽yang dag par rdzogs @135a *//
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / yang dag par rdzogs @135a *//
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dag de ltar mthong ngo //
analyzed: pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dag de ltar mthong ngo //
translated: those who are followers of the vehicle of the perfectly awakened buddhas see in this way.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bus smras pa /
translated: Śāradvatīputra said,

original: 'jam dpal / khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar mthong /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar mthong /
translated: “Mañjuśrī, how do you see the Thus-Gone One?”🔽Mañjuśrī replied,

original: 'jam dpal gyis smras pa; btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽glang po chen po zhog cig /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyis smras pa; btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / glang po chen po zhog cig /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽leave the great elephant alone!

original: glang po chen po ma bskyod cig /
analyzed: glang po chen po ma bskyod cig /
translated: Do not disturb the great elephant!”

original: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: The venerable Śāradvatīputra then said to the youthful Mañjuśrī,

original: 'jam dpal / sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dvags /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dvags /
translated: “Mañjuśrī, what is the meaning of the word ‘buddha’?

original: 'jam dpal gyis smras pa /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyis smras pa /
translated: ” Mañjuśrī replied,

original: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: bdag ces bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dvags /
analyzed: bdag ces bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dvags /
translated: what is the meaning of the word ‘self’?

original: sh'a radva ti'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bus smras pa /
translated: ” Śāradvatīputra said,

original: 'jam dpal / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / 'di lta ste /
translated: “Mañjuśrī, it is like this:

original: bdag ces bya ba de ni /
analyzed: bdag ces bya ba de ni /
translated: the word ‘self’

original: skye ba med pa'i tshig bla dvags so //
analyzed: skye ba med pa'i tshig bla dvags so //
translated: is a synonym for non-arising.

original: 'jam dpal gyis smras pa /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyis smras pa /
translated: ” Mañjuśrī replied,

original: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: it is so.

original: bdag ces bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dvags yin pa sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de yang de'i tshig bla dvags so //
analyzed: bdag ces bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dvags yin pa sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de yang de'i tshig bla dvags so //
translated: The word ‘buddha’ is a synonym for whatever the word ‘self’ is a synonym for.

original: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: yang 'di lta ste /
analyzed: yang 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de ni /
translated: the word ‘buddha’

original: gzhi med ba'i tshig bla dvags so //
analyzed: gzhi med ba'i tshig bla dvags so //
translated: is a synonym for the groundless.

original: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de ni /
translated: the so-called Buddha

original: tshig gis shes par bya bar dka' ba'o //
analyzed: tshig gis shes par bya bar dka' ba'o //
translated: is difficult to understand with words.

original: btsun ba sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽tshig kyang 'di ni /
analyzed: btsun ba sh'a radva ti'i bu / tshig kyang 'di ni /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽words are also difficult to examine,

original: tshig go / zhes brtag par dka' na /
analyzed: tshig go / zhes brtag par dka' na /
translated: thinking, “This is a word.”

original: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba lta ci smos /
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba lta ci smos /
translated: How much more so the so-called Buddha!

original: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dvags zhes de skad smras ba ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dvags zhes de skad smras ba ni /
translated: when it is said, “What is the meaning of the so-called Buddha?”

original: gang yang dag par ma grub pa @135b dang / ma skyes pa dang / mi 'gag pa ste /
analyzed: gang yang dag par ma grub pa @135b dang / ma skyes pa dang / mi 'gag pa ste /
translated: it is that which is not truly established, not arisen, and not ceased.

original: gang chos gang dang yang mi ldan pa de la gzhi ci yang med cing /
analyzed: gang chos gang dang yang mi ldan pa de la gzhi ci yang med cing /
translated: That which is not endowed with any dharma at all has no basis whatsoever.

original: gzhi dbyer med la gzhi med pa ste /
analyzed: gzhi dbyer med la gzhi med pa ste /
translated: The indivisible basis is the absence of basis.

original: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de ni /
translated: the so-called Buddha

original: de'i tshig bla dvags so //
analyzed: de'i tshig bla dvags so //
translated: is the meaning of that term.

original: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa tshol bar 'dod pas ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa tshol bar 'dod pas ni /
translated: those who wish to seek the Tathāgata

original: bdag btsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag btsal bar bya'o //
translated: should seek the self.

original: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: bdag ces bya ba de ni /
analyzed: bdag ces bya ba de ni /
translated: the word “self”

original: sangs rgyas kyi tshig bla dvags te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi tshig bla dvags te /
translated: is a synonym for buddha.

original: ji ltar bdag ces bya ba shin tu med cing mi dmigs pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyang shin tu med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ji ltar bdag ces bya ba shin tu med cing mi dmigs pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyang shin tu med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Just as the word “self” is utterly nonexistent and non-apprehensible, so too is a buddha utterly nonexistent and non-apprehensible.

original: ji ltar bdag ces bya ba'i chos gang gis kyang tshig tu brjod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos gang gis kyang tshig tu brjod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar bdag ces bya ba'i chos gang gis kyang tshig tu brjod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos gang gis kyang tshig tu brjod pa ma yin no //
translated: Just as the word “self” is not expressed by any phenomenon, so too is the word “buddha” not expressed by any phenomenon.

original: gang la grangs su bya ba med pa de ni /
analyzed: gang la grangs su bya ba med pa de ni /
translated: That which is not counted

original: sangs rgyas zhes bya ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes bya ste /
translated: is called “buddha.”

original: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽bdag ces bya ba'i gzhi'i tshig bla dvags de ni /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / bdag ces bya ba'i gzhi'i tshig bla dvags de ni /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: shes par sla ba ma yin no //
analyzed: shes par sla ba ma yin no //
translated: the word “self” is not an easy basis for understanding.

original: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de bzhin du sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i gzhi'i tshig bla dvags 'di yang shes par sla ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i gzhi'i tshig bla dvags 'di yang shes par sla ba ma yin no //
translated: in the same way, the word “buddha” is not an easy basis for understanding.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Śāradvatīputra said to the Blessed One:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni /
translated: this youthful Mañjuśrī

original: ji ltar las dang po pas 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu mi ston to //
analyzed: ji ltar las dang po pas 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu mi ston to //
translated: does not teach in a way that beginners can understand.”

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: When this was said, the youthful Mañjuśrī said to the venerable Śāradvatīputra:

original: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //

analyzed: 'jam dpal / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying por 'dug la /

analyzed: 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa /

analyzed: de'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bgyi'o //

analyzed: byang chub de yang ma skyes pa ste /

analyzed: gang byang chub kyi snying po las ldang ba gang yang ma mchis shing mi dmigs te /

original: bcom ldan 'das /

original: rnam grangs 'dis na /
analyzed: rnam grangs 'dis na /

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying por mchis la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying por mchis la /

analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
