translated: The domain of all phenomena is the domain of bodhisattva great beings.

original: sems dpa' chen po spyod yul la zhugs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po spyod yul la zhugs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: If one engages in this, the bodhisattva great beings are said to have entered the domain.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: spyod yul ma yin pa theg pa thams cad pa 'di nyid spyod yul yin no //
analyzed: spyod yul ma yin pa theg pa thams cad pa 'di nyid spyod yul yin no //
translated: This domain that is not a domain is the domain of the Great Vehicle.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: spyod yul 'di ni /
analyzed: spyod yul 'di ni /
translated: This domain

original: ma byas pa ste /
analyzed: ma byas pa ste /
translated: is not made.

original: de'i phyir spyod yul ma yin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir spyod yul ma yin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called ‘not a domain.’

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then Mañjuśrī Kumārabhūta said to the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽gang la spyad na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / gang la spyad na /
translated: “Blessed One,🔽if bodhisattva mahāsattvas practice in what way

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /
translated: will they quickly fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?”

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: When he had said this, the Blessed One said to Mañjuśrī Kumārabhūta,

original: 'jam dpal / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na /
translated: “Mañjuśrī, if you practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Bodhisattva mahāsattvas will quickly attain manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment.

original: 'jam dpal / bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de /
translated: Mañjuśrī, there is a meditative absorption called ‘single arrangement.’

original: ting nge 'dzin de la spyad na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la spyad na /
translated: If one practices this meditative absorption,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: bodhisattva mahāsattvas will quickly attain manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment.”

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: When this had been said, the youthful Mañjuśrī addressed the Blessed One as follows:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar 'jug par bgyi /
analyzed: bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar 'jug par bgyi /
translated: how do bodhisattva mahāsattvas enter the meditative absorption of single arrangement?

original: ci'i slad du @154b bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bgyi /
analyzed: ci'i slad du @154b bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bgyi /
translated: Why is it called the meditative absorption of single arrangement?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied:🔽“Mañjuśrī,

original: 'jam dpal / bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni /
translated: “Mañjuśrī, this is called the ‘single arrangement.’

original: skye ba med pa'i tshig bla dvags so //🔽bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: skye ba med pa'i tshig bla dvags so // bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: It is a synonym for non-arising.

original: rigs kyi bu mos thog ma nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dri ba bya dgos te /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mos thog ma nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dri ba bya dgos te /
translated: A son or daughter of good family who wishes to enter the single arrangement samādhi should first of all ask about the perfection of wisdom.

original: de'i 'og tu bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: Only then will they enter the single arrangement samādhi.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: 'jam dpal / skye ba med pa ni /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / skye ba med pa ni /
translated: Mañjuśrī, non-arising

original: mi 'khrugs pa ste /🔽dkrug tu mi rung ba /
analyzed: mi 'khrugs pa ste / dkrug tu mi rung ba /
translated: is unshakable.🔽It cannot be disturbed.

original: dkrug par bya ba ma yin pa /
analyzed: dkrug par bya ba ma yin pa /
translated: It cannot be agitated.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
translated: It is inconceivable.

original: bsam par mi bya ba /
analyzed: bsam par mi bya ba /
translated: It should not be thought about.

original: bsam gyis mi lang ba'o //🔽'jam dpal / bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi lang ba'o // 'jam dpal / bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: It is beyond thought.

original: rigs kyi bu mos dben pa'i lam rnams bsten par bya /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mos dben pa'i lam rnams bsten par bya /
translated: “Mañjuśrī, a son or daughter of good family who wishes to enter the single arrangement samādhi should rely on the path of solitude.

original: 'du 'dzi med pa la dga' bar byas la mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi bya bar skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas der mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa gcig yid la bya'o //
analyzed: 'du 'dzi med pa la dga' bar byas la mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi bya bar skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas der mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa gcig yid la bya'o //
translated: Having taken delight in solitude, and not attending to any signs, one should sit down cross-legged, and attend to one Tathāgata there, without apprehending anything.

original: chos thams cad kyang yid la bya'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyang yid la bya'o //
translated: He should sit down cross-legged, without any discursive thoughts, and without paying attention to any signs. He should pay attention to one Tathāgata, and to all dharmas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gang yid la byed pa de'i ming yang gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gang yid la byed pa de'i ming yang gzung bar bya'o //
translated: He should pay attention to the name of the Tathāgata to whom he is paying attention.

original: ming de yang thos te dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs ga la bzhugs pa'i phyogs der mngon du bltas te 'dug par bya'o //🔽yid la bya'o //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid yid la byas na /
analyzed: ming de yang thos te dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs ga la bzhugs pa'i phyogs der mngon du bltas te 'dug par bya'o // yid la bya'o // de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid yid la byas na /
translated: Having heard that name, and paid attention to it, he should sit down facing the direction in which that Tathāgata is dwelling.🔽He should pay attention to that Tathāgata.

original: de yid la byas pas /🔽'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan @155a *//
analyzed: de yid la byas pas / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan @155a *//
translated: By paying attention to that Tathāgata,

original: 'das rnams yid la byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'das rnams yid la byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: he pays attention to all the Buddhas, the Blessed Ones, of the past, future, and present.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa 'di nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa 'di nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the oneness of the Tathāgatas.

original: 'jam dpal / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi sangs rgyas kyi yon tan tshad med pa dang / spobs pa tshad med pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi sangs rgyas kyi yon tan tshad med pa dang / spobs pa tshad med pa de bzhin du /
translated: Mañjuśrī, just as the boundless qualities of a single Tathāgata and his boundless eloquence

original: 'jam dpal / bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas skye ba med pa gcig gis chos kyi rnam grangs kyi bye brag tshad med par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'jam dpal / bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas skye ba med pa gcig gis chos kyi rnam grangs kyi bye brag tshad med par shes par bya'o //
translated: are so, Mañjuśrī, having attained the samādhi of a single array, one should understand the boundless varieties of Dharma teachings through a single non-arising.

original: 'dir gang dag chud par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang dag gsungs pa dang / kun dga' bos ji snyed yongs su bzung ba de snyed kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir gang dag chud par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang dag gsungs pa dang / kun dga' bos ji snyed yongs su bzung ba de snyed kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di snang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, as many Dharma teachings as have been included, as many as have been taught by the Tathāgatas, the Arhats, the Perfectly Awakened Ones, and as many as have been fully taken up by Ānanda, that many Dharma teachings will appear.

original: bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bsgrubs pas /
analyzed: bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bsgrubs pas /
translated: By accomplishing this samādhi of a single array,

original: de'i tshe tshad ji tsam pa de tsam du gnas shing gleng gzhi dang bcas pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe tshad ji tsam pa de tsam du gnas shing gleng gzhi dang bcas pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: one will abide for as long as one's lifespan and teach the Dharma with its background stories.

original: 'jam dpal / de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa kha cig 'di snyam du /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa kha cig 'di snyam du /
translated: Mañjuśrī, some people who follow the Bodhisattva Vehicle may think,

original: bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di gang yin snyam du sems na /
analyzed: bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di gang yin snyam du sems na /
translated: ‘What is this one-pillared absorption?’

original: de dag la 'di skad ces /
analyzed: de dag la 'di skad ces /
translated: They should be told,🔽‘Hold this accomplishment of inconceivable qualities in mind, and then abide in it.

original: yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bsgrubs pa 'di yang dag par zungs la 'dug cig dang / ji lta ji ltar yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de lta de ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di'i yon tan mthong bar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bsgrubs pa 'di yang dag par zungs la 'dug cig dang / ji lta ji ltar yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de lta de ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di'i yon tan mthong bar 'gyur gyi /
translated: To the extent that you take it up and abide in it, you will see the qualities of this absorption.

original: ji skad bstan pa'i tshul gyis zhum pa med par gyis shig ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: ji skad bstan pa'i tshul gyis zhum pa med par gyis shig ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: Do not be discouraged in the way that has been taught.’

original: ting nge 'dzin 'di ni /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'di ni /
translated: This absorption

original: dmigs pa'i lta ba can dag dang / dngos @155b por lta ba can dag nas yod par lta ba can dag gi bar gyis bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i lta ba can dag dang / dngos @155b por lta ba can dag nas yod par lta ba can dag gi bar gyis bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: cannot be accomplished by those who have a view of reference points, those who have a view of entities, and so forth, up to those who have a view of existence.

original: 'jam dpal / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / 'di lta ste /
translated: Mañjuśrī, it is like this:

original: dper na / mi zhig la rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po che byi dor ma byas pa zhig bdog la; mi gzhan zhig gis der mi de la 'di skad du /
analyzed: dper na / mi zhig la rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po che byi dor ma byas pa zhig bdog la; mi gzhan zhig gis der mi de la 'di skad du /
translated: Another person would say to that person:

original: kye skyes bu /
analyzed: kye skyes bu /
translated: ‘Hey, person!

original: nor bu rin po che 'di'i rin thang ji tsam /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che 'di'i rin thang ji tsam /
translated: What is the value of this precious jewel?

original: nor bu rin po che 'di la yon tan ci zhig yod zer la /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che 'di la yon tan ci zhig yod zer la /
translated: What are the qualities of this precious jewel?’

original: mi des kyang de la 'di skad du /
analyzed: mi des kyang de la 'di skad du /
translated: And that person would say to him:

original: kye skyes bu /
analyzed: kye skyes bu /
translated: ‘Hey, person!

original: nor bu rin po che 'di'i yon tan tshad med pa nyid du shes par gyis shig ces smras te /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che 'di'i yon tan tshad med pa nyid du shes par gyis shig ces smras te /
translated: Know that the qualities of this precious jewel are immeasurable!’🔽Then that person would leave the precious jewel with that person in order to have it polished.

original: de nas mi des nor bu rin po che de byi dor bya ba'i phyir mi de la bzhag nas kye skyes bu /
analyzed: de nas mi des nor bu rin po che de byi dor bya ba'i phyir mi de la bzhag nas kye skyes bu /
translated: ‘Hey, person!

original: nor bu rin po che 'di re zhig byi dor gyis shig dang / de nas shes par 'gyur ro //🔽zhes byas la /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che 'di re zhig byi dor gyis shig dang / de nas shes par 'gyur ro // zhes byas la /
translated: Polish this precious jewel for a while, and then you will know.’

original: de nas mi des nor bu rin po che de /
analyzed: de nas mi des nor bu rin po che de /
translated: Then that person would leave the precious jewel with that person in order to have it polished.

original: mi de las blangs te byi dor bya ba'i yo byad rnams kyis byi dor byas pa dang; de ltar byi dor byas pas nor bu rin po che de rin thang med de /🔽des ji lta ji ltar nor bu rin po che de'i byi dor byas pa de lta de ltar nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan mthong bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du; 'jam dpal /🔽gang dang gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de /
analyzed: mi de las blangs te byi dor bya ba'i yo byad rnams kyis byi dor byas pa dang; de ltar byi dor byas pas nor bu rin po che de rin thang med de / des ji lta ji ltar nor bu rin po che de'i byi dor byas pa de lta de ltar nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan mthong bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du; 'jam dpal / gang dang gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de /
translated: He would then take it to a jeweler, who would clean it with various cleaning substances.🔽As the jewel was being cleaned, its value would become apparent.

original: ting nge 'dzin 'di la mnyam par 'jog pa dang 'jug pa de dang de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin de'i yon tan mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'di la mnyam par 'jog pa dang 'jug pa de dang de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin de'i yon tan mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: “Mañjuśrī, in the same way, whenever a son or daughter of noble family enters into and rests in this meditative absorption, they will see the qualities of that meditative absorption.

original: 'jam dpal / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / 'di lta ste /
translated: “Mañjuśrī, it is like this:

original: dper na / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer dag gis dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' gang yang ma khyab pa med do //🔽'jam dpal / de bzhin du bkod pa gcig pa'i ting @156a *//
analyzed: dper na / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer dag gis dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' gang yang ma khyab pa med do // 'jam dpal / de bzhin du bkod pa gcig pa'i ting @156a *//
translated: there is no place in the orb of the sun that is not illuminated by its rays.

original: nge 'dzin 'di thob cing zhugs nas rnyed pa de /
analyzed: nge 'dzin 'di thob cing zhugs nas rnyed pa de /
translated: “Mañjuśrī, in the same way, once this meditative absorption of a single array has been attained and entered, the qualities of that meditative absorption will be seen.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa ma yin pa'i chos gang yang mi ston to //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa ma yin pa'i chos gang yang mi ston to //
translated: He does not teach any Dharma that does not teach the perfection of wisdom.

original: gang la las 'di bzhin du shes na /
analyzed: gang la las 'di bzhin du shes na /
translated: Whoever understands it in this way

original: des skye ba med pa dang 'gal ba'i chos gang yang mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: des skye ba med pa dang 'gal ba'i chos gang yang mi mthong ngo //
translated: will not see any Dharma that is not in accord with non-arising.

original: 'jam dpal / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / 'di lta ste /
translated: Mañjuśrī, it is like this:

original: dper na / rgya mtsho chen po'i phyogs bzhi nas skyes bu bzhi chu 'chu na /🔽de thams cad 'di lta ste /
analyzed: dper na / rgya mtsho chen po'i phyogs bzhi nas skyes bu bzhi chu 'chu na / de thams cad 'di lta ste /
translated: For example, if four people were to draw water from the four directions into the great ocean,🔽all of it would be drawn in as a single taste,

original: lan tshva'i ror ro gcig pa nyid du 'chu zhing len to //
analyzed: lan tshva'i ror ro gcig pa nyid du 'chu zhing len to //
translated: namely the taste of salt.🔽Mañjuśrī, in the same way, whatever Dharma I teach,

original: 'jam dpal / de bzhin du ngas chos gang ci bstan pa de dag thams cad ni /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / de bzhin du ngas chos gang ci bstan pa de dag thams cad ni / 'di lta ste /
translated: all of it

original: skye ba med pa'i ro dang / dngos po med pa'i ro dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i ro dang / rnam par grol ba'i ro dang / 'gog pa'i ror ro gcig go /
analyzed: skye ba med pa'i ro dang / dngos po med pa'i ro dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i ro dang / rnam par grol ba'i ro dang / 'gog pa'i ror ro gcig go /
translated: is of a single taste, namely the taste of non-arising, the taste of non-entity, the taste of freedom from desire, the taste of liberation, the taste of cessation.

original: 'jam dpal / de lta bas na /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / de lta bas na /
translated: Mañjuśrī, therefore

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo ting nge 'dzin 'di dang ldan pa de; chos gang dang gang ston kyang de dag thams cad 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo ting nge 'dzin 'di dang ldan pa de; chos gang dang gang ston kyang de dag thams cad 'di lta ste /
translated: “Son of noble family, or daughter of noble family, endowed with this samādhi, whatever Dharma they teach, all of that they teach as having one taste, which is to say:

original: skye ba med pa'i ro dang / dngos po med pa'i ro dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i ro dang / rnam par grol ba'i ro dang / 'gog pa'i ror ro gcig par ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skye ba med pa'i ro dang / dngos po med pa'i ro dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i ro dang / rnam par grol ba'i ro dang / 'gog pa'i ror ro gcig par ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: the taste of non-arising, the taste of non-entity, the taste of freedom from desire, the taste of liberation, and the taste of cessation.

original: ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Having heard this samādhi, that son of noble family,

original: rigs kyi bu mo de /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de /
translated: or daughter of noble family,

original: 'dod na ngas chos gang ci bstan pa de 'chad pa dang / rnam par ston pa dang / nye bar ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dod na ngas chos gang ci bstan pa de 'chad pa dang / rnam par ston pa dang / nye bar ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: if they wish, will explain, demonstrate, and reveal whatever Dharma I have taught.

original: 'jam dpal / de ltar na /🔽rigs kyi bu 'am /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / de ltar na / rigs kyi bu 'am /
translated: Mañjuśrī, in this way🔽that son of noble family,

original: rigs kyi bu mo de /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de /
translated: or daughter of noble family,

original: ting nge 'dzin 'di thob nas gang ci yang ston kyang de dag thams cad mi dmigs @156b ba'i tshul du ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / dngos po med par ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'di thob nas gang ci yang ston kyang de dag thams cad mi dmigs @156b ba'i tshul du ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / dngos po med par ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: having attained this samādhi, whatever they teach, all of that they teach as non-apprehensible, in a manner that is unborn, non-arisen, and non-entity.

original: 'jam dpal / gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs nas myur ba nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
analyzed: 'jam dpal / gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs nas myur ba nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
translated: Mañjuśrī, moreover, the bodhisattva mahāsattva who has attained meditative concentration will quickly perfect the factors of awakening and will quickly fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood.

original: ro // 'jam dpal /
analyzed: ro // 'jam dpal /
translated: Mañjuśrī,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe bdag gi dbyings nas chos kyi dbyings kyi bar du skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / gcig kho na dang / tha dad pa kho na ra yang mi mthong na /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe bdag gi dbyings nas chos kyi dbyings kyi bar du skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / gcig kho na dang / tha dad pa kho na ra yang mi mthong na /
translated: furthermore, when the bodhisattva mahāsattva does not see in the realm of self up to the realm of phenomena any arising, cessation, sameness, or difference,

original: 'jam dpal / de lta bu'i bzod pa can gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: 'jam dpal / de lta bu'i bzod pa can gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: Mañjuśrī, the bodhisattva mahāsattva who has such patience will quickly fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood.

original: rigs kyi bu gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mi sems pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa de'i bzod pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mi sems pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa de'i bzod pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Son of noble family, I declare that those who do not think about, and do not conceptualize, unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening will attain the qualities of a bodhisattva and the qualities of a buddha.

original: gang sangs rgyas nyid kyi phyir byang chub tu mi smon pa de lta bu'i bzod pa 'di yang rigs kyi bu de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu myur bar 'gyur bar ngas bshad do //
analyzed: gang sangs rgyas nyid kyi phyir byang chub tu mi smon pa de lta bu'i bzod pa 'di yang rigs kyi bu de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu myur bar 'gyur bar ngas bshad do //
translated: Son of noble family, I declare that those who do not aspire to awakening for the sake of buddhahood will quickly reach unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni /
translated: All phenomena

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos so //
translated: are the qualities of a buddha.

original: zhes su de ltar mos shing zhum par mi 'gyur ba /
analyzed: zhes su de ltar mos shing zhum par mi 'gyur ba /
translated: I declare that those who believe this and are not discouraged

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par ngas bshad de /🔽de ni / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams @157a *//
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par ngas bshad de / de ni / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams @157a *//
translated: will not turn back from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽They should be said to be

original: cad dang ma bral bar brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: cad dang ma bral bar brjod par bya'o //
translated: not separate from all the qualities of a buddha.

original: rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bstan pa 'di thos nas rmongs par mi 'gyur ba dang / som nyi za bar mi 'gyur ba de yang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang mi 'bral bar brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bstan pa 'di thos nas rmongs par mi 'gyur ba dang / som nyi za bar mi 'gyur ba de yang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang mi 'bral bar brjod par bya'o //
translated: “Noble son, I declare that any sons or daughters of noble family who, having heard this teaching, are not confused and do not doubt it will never be separated from all the qualities of the buddhas.”

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to; ;bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to; ;bcom ldan 'das /
translated: When this had been said, Mañjuśrī Kumārabhūta asked the Blessed One, “Blessed One,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyu las nges par 'byung ba lags sam /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyu las nges par 'byung ba lags sam /
translated: does unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening arise from a cause?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: 'jam dpal / de ni /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / de ni /
translated: “Mañjuśrī,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: it does not.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni /
translated: Unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening

original: rgyu ma yin zhing /
analyzed: rgyu ma yin zhing /
translated: is not a cause

original: rgyu las nges par byung ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu las nges par byung ba yang ma yin no //
translated: and does not arise from a cause.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: skye ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa ni /
analyzed: skye ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa ni /
translated: Non-arising and non-entity

original: rgyu yang ma yin la rgyu las nges par 'byung ba yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu yang ma yin la rgyu las nges par 'byung ba yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are not causes and they do not arise from causes.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all phenomena are unborn.

original: 'jam dpal / de lta bas na /🔽rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / de lta bas na / rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Therefore, Mañjuśrī,

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bstan pa 'di thos nas nur bar mi 'gyur ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par ngas bshad do //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bstan pa 'di thos nas nur bar mi 'gyur ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par ngas bshad do //
translated: I declare that any son or daughter of noble family who hears this teaching and does not turn away from it will not turn back from unsurpassed and perfect awakening.

original: 'jam dpal / de lta bas na /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / de lta bas na /
translated: Therefore, Mañjuśrī,🔽any monk,

original: dge slong ngam /🔽dge slong ma'am /
analyzed: dge slong ngam / dge slong ma'am /
translated: nun,

original: dge bsnyen nam /
analyzed: dge bsnyen nam /
translated: male lay follower,

original: dge bsnyen ma gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la zhum par mi 'gyur ba nas nur ba'i bar du mi 'gyur ba de dag ni /
analyzed: dge bsnyen ma gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la zhum par mi 'gyur ba nas nur ba'i bar du mi 'gyur ba de dag ni /
translated: or female lay follower who does not become timid, and so on up to does not turn away from this profound perfection of wisdom,

original: nga la skyabs su dong ba'o //
analyzed: nga la skyabs su dong ba'o //
translated: has taken refuge in me.

original: de dag ni /
analyzed: de dag ni /
translated: They

original: @157b nga'i rjes su rab tu byung ba'o //🔽de dag gi ston pa ni /
analyzed: @157b nga'i rjes su rab tu byung ba'o // de dag gi ston pa ni /
translated: are my followers who have gone forth.🔽They

original: nga yin no //
analyzed: nga yin no //
translated: are my teachers.

original: 'jam dpal / rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Mañjuśrī, any son or daughter of noble family

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mi slob pa de /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mi slob pa de /
translated: “Son of a good family, those who do not train in this deep perfection of wisdom

original: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la mi slob pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la mi slob pa'o //
translated: do not train in the training of a bodhisattva.

original: 'jam dpal / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / 'di lta ste /
translated: Mañjuśrī, it is like this:

original: dper na / 'byung ba'i tshogs dang / sa bon gyi tshogs dang / rtsva dang / shing ge la pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal gang ci yod pa de thams cad ni /
analyzed: dper na / 'byung ba'i tshogs dang / sa bon gyi tshogs dang / rtsva dang / shing ge la pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal gang ci yod pa de thams cad ni /
translated: Whatever collections of elements, collections of seeds, grasses, trees, medicinal plants, and forests there are

original: sa chen po la brten nas skye'o //
analyzed: sa chen po la brten nas skye'o //
translated: all grow in dependence on the great earth.

original: 'jam dpal / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i chos gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin na /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i chos gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin na /
translated: Mañjuśrī, in the same way, whatever wholesome dharmas there are of bodhisattva great beings, if they are embraced by the perfection of wisdom,

original: 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / yangs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / yangs par 'gyur te /
translated: they increase, expand, and become vast,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu slu bar mi byed do //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu slu bar mi byed do //
translated: and do not deceive unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: The Blessed One having said this, Mañjuśrī Kumārabhūta said to him:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa lags pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di dzambu'i gling 'dir grong ngam /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa lags pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di dzambu'i gling 'dir grong ngam /
translated: will there be any in this Jambudvīpa who will uphold this teaching of the perfection of wisdom, which is the Blessed One’s teaching of the perfection of wisdom,

original: grong khyer ram /
analyzed: grong khyer ram /
translated: in a town, city,

original: yul lam / ljongs dag tu gang la la dag 'dzin par 'gyur ba nas ston pa'i bar du 'gyur ba mchis sam /
analyzed: yul lam / ljongs dag tu gang la la dag 'dzin par 'gyur ba nas ston pa'i bar du 'gyur ba mchis sam /
translated: country, or region, and who will teach it?”

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skas ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skas ces bka' stsal to //
translated: The Blessed One said to Mañjuśrī Kumārabhūta:

original: 'jam dpal / gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di da ltar gyi tshe la thos nas bdag @158a *//
analyzed: 'jam dpal / gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di da ltar gyi tshe la thos nas bdag @158a *//
translated: “Mañjuśrī, those who hear this teaching of the perfection of wisdom in this lifetime

original: tshe brjes nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan to //
analyzed: tshe brjes nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan to //
translated: and listen to this perfection of wisdom after they have passed away,

original: zhes smon lam btab pa de dag ni /
analyzed: zhes smon lam btab pa de dag ni /
translated: These are the aspirations they will make.🔽They will listen to this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom, and having listened, they will attain vast delight and joy.

original: nyan pa nas rgya cher mi sgom pa'i tshul gyis sgom par byed pa'i bar du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyan pa nas rgya cher mi sgom pa'i tshul gyis sgom par byed pa'i bar du 'gyur ro //
translated: They will then cultivate it, up to and including the extensive cultivation of meditative stability.

original: 'jam dpal / gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos te /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos te /
translated: Mañjuśrī, those who listen to this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / mgu ba yangs pa thob pa de dag ni /
analyzed: thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / mgu ba yangs pa thob pa de dag ni /
translated: and having listened, attain vast delight and joy,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba chung bar nga mi 'chad do //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba chung bar nga mi 'chad do //
translated: I do not say that they have meager roots of virtue.

original: 'jam dpal / gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di la nyan 'dod par gyur na /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di la nyan 'dod par gyur na /
translated: Mañjuśrī, if someone wishes to listen to this teaching of the transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: de la 'di skad ces /
analyzed: de la 'di skad ces /
translated: they should be told the following:

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: ‘Son of a good family,

original: khyod don mnyan pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: khyod don mnyan pas ci zhig bya /
translated: what will you do by listening to the meaning?

original: thos nas ma dad cing phyir nur ta re /
analyzed: thos nas ma dad cing phyir nur ta re /
translated: Having listened, you will lack faith and turn back.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di la chos gang yang yongs su 'grub par ma bstan te /
analyzed: 'di la chos gang yang yongs su 'grub par ma bstan te /
translated: In this, no phenomenon is taught to be fully established.

original: so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams skye ba'am /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams skye ba'am /
translated: The phenomena of ordinary beings are not taught to arise,

original: 'jig par yang ma bstan /
analyzed: 'jig par yang ma bstan /
translated: nor are they taught to perish.

original: slob pa'i chos rnams dang / mi slob pa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye ba'am /🔽'jig pa'am / 'thob par ma bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: slob pa'i chos rnams dang / mi slob pa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye ba'am / 'jig pa'am / 'thob par ma bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the dharmas of the learner, the dharmas of the non-learner, the dharmas of the pratyekabuddha, and the dharmas of the Buddha.

original: zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: It is because the arising, the passing away, and the attainment of these dharmas are not taught.🔽”

original: de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: The Lord having said this, Mañjuśrī Kumārabhūta said to him:

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽dge slong ngam /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / dge slong ngam /
translated: “Lord,🔽if a monk,

original: dge slong ma'am /
analyzed: dge slong ma'am /
translated: or a nun,

original: dge bsnyen nam /
analyzed: dge bsnyen nam /
translated: or a layman,

original: dge bsnyen ma gang la la bdag la 'di skad du /
analyzed: dge bsnyen ma gang la la bdag la 'di skad du /
translated: or a laywoman should ask me,

original: deng de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi gtam mdzad pa de gang yin zhes mchi na /
analyzed: deng de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi gtam mdzad pa de gang yin zhes mchi na /
translated: ‘What is the Dharma discourse of the Tathāgata today?’,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: de skad 'dri ba de la bdag @158b gis 'di skad du /🔽chos thams cad dang mi 'gal ba'i gtam mo //
analyzed: de skad 'dri ba de la bdag @158b gis 'di skad du / chos thams cad dang mi 'gal ba'i gtam mo //
translated: I would say to the one who asks this:

original: zhes brjod par bgyi'o //
analyzed: zhes brjod par bgyi'o //
translated: ‘The discourse that does not contradict any dharma.’🔽”

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: “Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: gang skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchis te /
analyzed: gang skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchis te /
translated: There is no phenomenon that is not born and does not cease.

original: bka' mchid de ni /
analyzed: bka' mchid de ni /
translated: This teaching

original: sems can gang gis kyang 'tshal bar sla ba ma lags so //
analyzed: sems can gang gis kyang 'tshal bar sla ba ma lags so //
translated: is not easily understood by any sentient being.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar / sems can gang yang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar / sems can gang yang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o //
translated: Because no sentient being can be apprehended.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gzhan yang bdag gis de la 'di skad du /🔽mi skye ba zhes bya ba'i chos de bstan par gyur to //
analyzed: gzhan yang bdag gis de la 'di skad du / mi skye ba zhes bya ba'i chos de bstan par gyur to //
translated: I also said to him,

original: zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: ‘This teaching called “non-arising” has been taught.’

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni /
translated: it is because all phenomena

original: skye ba ma mchis par mnyam pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: skye ba ma mchis par mnyam pa'i slad du'o //
translated: are the same in being unborn.

original: bka' mchid des ni /
analyzed: bka' mchid des ni /
translated: This teaching

original: ji ltar dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams kyis so so'i skye bo'i chos de dag rnam par gzhig pa ma lags pa /
analyzed: ji ltar dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams kyis so so'i skye bo'i chos de dag rnam par gzhig pa ma lags pa /
translated: does not refute the phenomena of ordinary beings with the phenomena of an arhat.

original: dgra bcom pa rnams kyi gong ma rtogs pa ma bstan to //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa rnams kyi gong ma rtogs pa ma bstan to //
translated: It does not teach the realization that is superior to that of the arhats.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gzhan yang de la bdag gis 'di skad du /🔽chos bstan pa 'di la sems can gang yang mya ngan las 'das pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: gzhan yang de la bdag gis 'di skad du / chos bstan pa 'di la sems can gang yang mya ngan las 'das pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba med do //
translated: Moreover, I would say to him:

original: zhes brjod par bgyi'o //
analyzed: zhes brjod par bgyi'o //
translated: ‘In this teaching of the Dharma, there are no sentient beings at all who have attained nirvana, who are attaining nirvana, or who will attain nirvana.🔽’

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di ltar / sems can shin tu mi dmigs pa'i slad du ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar / sems can shin tu mi dmigs pa'i slad du ste /
translated: it is because sentient beings are not apprehended at all.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de skad 'dri na /
analyzed: de skad 'dri na /
translated: if asked in this way,

original: bdag gis de skad ces bgyi'o //
analyzed: bdag gis de skad ces bgyi'o //
translated: I would answer in this way.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gzhan yang bdag las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par 'tshal te /
analyzed: gzhan yang bdag las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par 'tshal te /
translated: I also wish to listen to this profound perfection of wisdom.

original: deng khyod bcom ldan 'das dang gtam ci zhig byas zhes 'dri @159a *//
analyzed: deng khyod bcom ldan 'das dang gtam ci zhig byas zhes 'dri @159a *//
translated: If asked, ‘What conversation did you have with the Blessed One today?’,

original: na; de la bdag gis 'di skad du /
analyzed: na; de la bdag gis 'di skad du /
translated: I would say to him:

original: gal te khyod de nyan par 'dod na /
analyzed: gal te khyod de nyan par 'dod na /
translated: ‘If you wish to listen to it,

original: de mnyan to //🔽snyam du yid ma gtod cig /
analyzed: de mnyan to // snyam du yid ma gtod cig /
translated: listen to it!🔽Do not focus your mind on the thought, “I will listen to it!”

original: mnyan to // snyam du sems ma skyed cig /
analyzed: mnyan to // snyam du sems ma skyed cig /
translated: Do not generate the thought, “I will listen to it!”

original: kye skyes bu /
analyzed: kye skyes bu /
translated: O man,

original: sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i shes rab ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i shes rab skyed cig /
analyzed: sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i shes rab ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i shes rab skyed cig /
translated: Generate the wisdom that is like the wisdom of an illusory person.

original: de lta bus chos bstan pa 'di shes par nus so //
analyzed: de lta bus chos bstan pa 'di shes par nus so //
translated: In that way, you will be able to understand this Dharma teaching.

original: kye skyes bu /
analyzed: kye skyes bu /
translated: “O person,

original: gal te khyod kyis chos bstan pa 'di mnyan par 'dod na /
analyzed: gal te khyod kyis chos bstan pa 'di mnyan par 'dod na /
translated: if you wish to listen to this Dharma teaching,

original: de'i phyir 'di ltar /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ltar /
translated: then in that case

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: you should be like this:

original: dper na / nam mkha' la bya'i rjes lta bur gnas par gyis shig /
analyzed: dper na / nam mkha' la bya'i rjes lta bur gnas par gyis shig /
translated: you should be like a bird’s path in the sky.

original: de lta bus chos bstan pa 'di mnyan par nus so //
analyzed: de lta bus chos bstan pa 'di mnyan par nus so //
translated: In that way, you will be able to listen to this Dharma teaching.

original: kye skyes bu /
analyzed: kye skyes bu /
translated: “O person,

original: gal te khyod kyis chos bstan pa 'di mnyan par 'dod na /
analyzed: gal te khyod kyis chos bstan pa 'di mnyan par 'dod na /
translated: if you wish to listen to this Dharma teaching,

original: de'i phyir gnyis la ma dmigs shig /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnyis la ma dmigs shig /
translated: then in that case do not focus on duality,

original: mi gnyis pa la yang ma dmigs shig /
analyzed: mi gnyis pa la yang ma dmigs shig /
translated: and do not focus on nonduality.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di la gnyis su brjod par bya ba yongs su brjod pa'am /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di la gnyis su brjod par bya ba yongs su brjod pa'am /
translated: Why is that?🔽Because there is nothing at all to be expressed as dual

original: mi gnyis par brjod par bya ba gang yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi gnyis par brjod par bya ba gang yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: or to be expressed as nondual.

original: gal te chos ston pa 'di nyan par 'dod na /
analyzed: gal te chos ston pa 'di nyan par 'dod na /
translated: If you wish to listen to this Dharma teaching,

original: bdag tu 'du shes pa rnams kyang ma gzhig cig /
analyzed: bdag tu 'du shes pa rnams kyang ma gzhig cig /
translated: do not destroy the perception of a self.

original: lta bar gyur pa rnams las kyang ma 'da' zhig /
analyzed: lta bar gyur pa rnams las kyang ma 'da' zhig /
translated: Do not go beyond the views.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la lhag par ma dmigs shig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la lhag par ma dmigs shig /
translated: Do not focus on the qualities of the Buddha.

original: so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams las kyang ma skyod cig /🔽ces brjod par bgyi'o //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams las kyang ma skyod cig / ces brjod par bgyi'o //
translated: Do not move from the qualities of ordinary beings.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gang zhig bdag la nyan par 'tshal te 'dri na /
analyzed: gang zhig bdag la nyan par 'tshal te 'dri na /
translated: if someone wishes to listen to me and asks me,

original: de la bdag gis de skad brjod par bgyi'o; ;de skad rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: de la bdag gis de skad brjod par bgyi'o; ;de skad rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: I will say this to them. I will teach them this.

original: 'di ltar 'di la gzhag par bgyi'o //🔽gal te 'dri ba'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di la gzhag par bgyi'o // gal te 'dri ba'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: I will establish them in this.

original: rigs kyi bu mo de ltar gnas shing /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de ltar gnas shing /
translated: If that son of a good family or daughter of a good family who asks questions🔽stays like that

original: de ltar zhugs na /
analyzed: de ltar zhugs na /
translated: and engages like that,

original: spobs pa'i phyag rgya @159b 'di la gnas pa de la slad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes pa dang / dngos po ma mchis pa dang / ma byung ba'i bar 'di bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: spobs pa'i phyag rgya @159b 'di la gnas pa de la slad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes pa dang / dngos po ma mchis pa dang / ma byung ba'i bar 'di bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: then later I will teach them this perfection of wisdom, which is unborn, up to which is non-apprehensible, and which is non-arisen.

original: de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //🔽'jam dpal / legs so //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // 'jam dpal / legs so //
translated: When this had been said, the Lord said to the youthful Mañjuśrī:🔽“Excellent, Mañjuśrī, excellent!

original: legs so // 'jam dpal /
analyzed: legs so // 'jam dpal /
translated: Mañjuśrī,

original: khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras pa legs so //🔽rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras pa legs so // rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: you have spoken these words well.🔽To that son of a good family or daughter of a good family,

original: rigs kyi bu mo de la yang phyis 'di skad gyis shig /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de la yang phyis 'di skad gyis shig /
translated: you should say this:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar 'dod na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar 'dod na /
translated: ‘If you want to see the Tathāgata,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mi sgom pa'i tshul gyis bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mi sgom pa'i tshul gyis bsgom par bya'o //
translated: you should meditate on this perfection of wisdom by way of not meditating.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o //
translated: A son of a good family or daughter of a good family who wants to serve the Tathāgata should train in this perfection of wisdom by way of not apprehending anything.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ni /
translated: The Tathāgata

original: bdag gi ston pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gi ston pa'o //
translated: is my teacher.

original: zhes smra bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o //🔽bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /🔽rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o; ;ting nge 'dzin thams cad la mkhas pa sgrub par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: zhes smra bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o // bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am / rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o; ;ting nge 'dzin thams cad la mkhas pa sgrub par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: “Those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family who want to teach this perfection of wisdom should train in just this perfection of wisdom, without apprehending anything.🔽“Those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family who want to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening should train in just this perfection of wisdom, without apprehending anything.🔽“Those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family who want to accomplish expertise in all meditative stabilizations should train in just this perfection of wisdom, without apprehending anything.

original: rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o //
translated: “Those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family who want to enter into all meditative stabilizations should train in just this perfection of wisdom, without apprehending anything.

original: @160a *// ting nge 'dzin thams cad la snyoms par 'jug par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: @160a *// ting nge 'dzin thams cad la snyoms par 'jug par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: “Those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family who want to enter into all meditative stabilizations should train in just this perfection of wisdom, without apprehending anything.

original: rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o //
translated: “Noble sons and daughters should train in this perfection of wisdom itself, without apprehending anything.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ting nge 'dzin de dag byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du sgrub par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de dag byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro // rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du sgrub par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Because those meditative stabilities are not made.

original: rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la dngos po med pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la dngos po med pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o //
translated: “Noble sons and daughters who want to accomplish the knowledge of a knower of all aspects endowed with all supreme aspects should train in this perfection of wisdom itself, without apprehending anything.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du byas pa ma yin pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du byas pa ma yin pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the knowledge of a knower of all aspects endowed with all supreme aspects is not made, is not born, and does not exist.

original: chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni /
translated: “All phenomena🔽are not made,🔽are not born,🔽and do not arise.

original: nge par 'byung ba dang bcas pa ste; gang nges par mi 'byung ba'i chos de gang yang med do //🔽zhes de ltar shes par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: nge par 'byung ba dang bcas pa ste; gang nges par mi 'byung ba'i chos de gang yang med do // zhes de ltar shes par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: There is nothing that is not a definite emergence.

original: rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshul gyis bslab par bya'o //🔽chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshul gyis bslab par bya'o // chos thams cad ni /
translated: Thus, a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family who wants to know this should train in this perfection of wisdom, up to the method of nonexistence.

original: nges par mi 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: nges par mi 'byung ba ste /
translated: All phenomena are a definite non-emergence.

original: gang nges par 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos de dag gang yang med do //
analyzed: gang nges par 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos de dag gang yang med do //
translated: There is nothing that is a definite emergence.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all phenomena are non-arisen.

original: chos de dag ni /
analyzed: chos de dag ni /
translated: Those phenomena

original: ji ltar brjod pa de ltar yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar brjod pa de ltar yod pa ma yin te /
translated: do not exist as they are described.

original: brjod pa med pa ni /
analyzed: brjod pa med pa ni /
translated: That which is not described

original: yod pa ma yin zhing dmigs su med do //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin zhing dmigs su med do //
translated: does not exist and is not apprehended.

original: zhes de ltar shes par 'dod @160b pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: zhes de ltar shes par 'dod @160b pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Thus, a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family who wants to know this should train in this perfection of wisdom, up to the method of nonexistence.

original: rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshul gyis bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshul gyis bslab par bya'o //
translated: “Noble sons and daughters should train in this perfection of wisdom, up to the knowledge of all aspects, by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: sems can thams cad ni /
analyzed: sems can thams cad ni /
translated: All sentient beings

original: byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa ste; gang byang chub kyi phyir mi spyod pa'i sems can de gang yang med do //🔽zhes na yang de la zhum pa med par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa ste; gang byang chub kyi phyir mi spyod pa'i sems can de gang yang med do // zhes na yang de la zhum pa med par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: are practicing for awakening. There is not a single sentient being who is not practicing for awakening.

original: rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshul gyis bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshul gyis bslab par bya'o //
translated: Even if they are not discouraged by that, noble sons and daughters should train in this perfection of wisdom, up to the knowledge of all aspects, by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar / chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar / chos thams cad ni /
translated: Because all phenomena

original: byang chub dang mnyam pa'o //🔽ji ltar chos thams cad byang chub dang mnyam pa dang / byang chub ji lta bar sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: byang chub dang mnyam pa'o // ji ltar chos thams cad byang chub dang mnyam pa dang / byang chub ji lta bar sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin no //
translated: are the same as awakening.🔽Just as all phenomena are the same as awakening, so too are all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad ji 'dra bar spyod pa de yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: sems can thams cad ji 'dra bar spyod pa de yang de bzhin no //
translated: Just as all sentient beings are, so too is practice.

original: med pa'i phyir spyod pa thams cad ni /
analyzed: med pa'i phyir spyod pa thams cad ni /
translated: Therefore, all practices

original: spyod pa med pa'o //
analyzed: spyod pa med pa'o //
translated: are non-practices.

original: de yang byang chub gang yin pa de skye ba med pa'ang de yin /
analyzed: de yang byang chub gang yin pa de skye ba med pa'ang de yin /
translated: Moreover, whatever is enlightenment is also non-arising,

original: 'byung ba med pa yang de yin te /
analyzed: 'byung ba med pa yang de yin te /
translated: and also non-occurrence.

original: de lta bu'i chos 'di la zhum pa med par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: de lta bu'i chos 'di la zhum pa med par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Thus, without being discouraged by this teaching,

original: rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la dngos po med pa dang / skye ba med pa'i bar gyi tshul gyis bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la dngos po med pa dang / skye ba med pa'i bar gyi tshul gyis bslab par bya'o //
translated: the sons and daughters of good lineage should train in this perfection of wisdom itself, by way of the non-existence of things up to non-arising.

original: zhes gyis shig /
analyzed: zhes gyis shig /
translated: Do it that way.

original: 'jam dpal / gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par rol ba'i bar de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las bstan to //
analyzed: 'jam dpal / gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par rol ba'i bar de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las bstan to //
translated: Mañjuśrī, those emanations of the Tathāgata, up to the displays of the Tathāgata, are also taught in this perfection of wisdom itself.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni / bstan du med pa ste /
analyzed: de ni / bstan du med pa ste /
translated: It is because

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: the perfection of wisdom

original: mi ston pa'i phyir @161a *//
analyzed: mi ston pa'i phyir @161a *//
translated: is not a teacher.

original: ro; ;'jam dpal /
analyzed: ro; ;'jam dpal /
translated: Mañjuśrī,

original: dge slong ngam /
analyzed: dge slong ngam /
translated: whether bhikṣus,

original: dge slong ma'am /
analyzed: dge slong ma'am /
translated: or a bhikṣuṇī,

original: dge bsnyen nam /
analyzed: dge bsnyen nam /
translated: or a male lay practitioner,

original: dge bsnyen ma gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las tshig bzhi ba'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam yang 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa nas yang dag par ston pa'i bar du byed pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog par nga 'chad na /
analyzed: dge bsnyen ma gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las tshig bzhi ba'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam yang 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa nas yang dag par ston pa'i bar du byed pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog par nga 'chad na /
translated: or a female lay practitioner who takes up even just a four-line verse from this perfection of wisdom, masters it, bears it in mind, reads it aloud, and is attentive to it in the correct manner, I say that they will not regress.

original: gang dag de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa lta ci smos te /🔽rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: gang dag de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa lta ci smos te / rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: What need is there to speak of those who practice in accordance with reality?🔽Those sons of enlightened heritage or

original: rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni /
translated: daughters of enlightened heritage

original: byang chub tu nges par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub tu nges par rig par bya'o //
translated: should be known to be certain of their destiny for enlightenment.

original: gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa'i bar 'di thos nas mi skrag /
analyzed: gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa'i bar 'di thos nas mi skrag /
translated: Those who, on hearing this profound perfection of wisdom, which is non-arisen, non-ceasing, without stain, without stainlessness, without decrease, and without increase,🔽are not terrified,

original: mi dang / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni /
analyzed: mi dang / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni /
translated: not frightened, and not fearful

original: sangs rgyas kyi yul la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yul la gnas pa'o //
translated: are dwelling in the domain of the buddhas.

original: gong du yang mos par byed na /
analyzed: gong du yang mos par byed na /
translated: If they also develop admiration,

original: de dag ni /
analyzed: de dag ni /
translated: they should be known to be

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nges par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nges par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be certain to attain all the qualities of a buddha.🔽Mañjuśrī, I will now set forth this seal

original: 'jam dpal / ngas sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / ngas sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba /
translated: that is approved by the buddhas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par mkhyen pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par mkhyen pa /
translated: that is known to the tathāgatas,

original: dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mnos pa'i rgya 'di gzhag par bya ste /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mnos pa'i rgya 'di gzhag par bya ste /
translated: and that is fully understood by all the arhats.

original: rgya 'di ni /
analyzed: rgya 'di ni /
translated: This seal

original: mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa rnams la bzhag go /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa rnams la bzhag go /
translated: is set forth for those who have realized sameness.

original: 'di ni / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar du yang chags pa med pa yongs su bstan pa'o //🔽'jam dpal / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: 'di ni / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar du yang chags pa med pa yongs su bstan pa'o // 'jam dpal / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: This is the teaching of the absence of attachment up to all the qualities of a buddha.🔽Mañjuśrī, the sons of the victors

original: rigs kyi bu mo rgya 'dis btab pa ni /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo rgya 'dis btab pa ni /
translated: or the daughters of the victors who are sealed with this seal

original: ngan song du 'gro ba'i skal ba can ma yin no //
analyzed: ngan song du 'gro ba'i skal ba can ma yin no //
translated: are not destined to go to the lower realms.

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'gro ba dang / 'jug pa'i skal ba @161b can ma yin no //
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'gro ba dang / 'jug pa'i skal ba @161b can ma yin no //
translated: They are not destined to go to or enter the level of the śrāvakas or the level of the pratyekabuddhas.

original: de nas de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i tsanda na gyi phye ma dang / lha'i gser gyi phye ma dang / lha'i me tog mand'a ra ba dang / mand'a ra ba chen po dang; lha'i spos dang /
analyzed: de nas de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i tsanda na gyi phye ma dang / lha'i gser gyi phye ma dang / lha'i me tog mand'a ra ba dang / mand'a ra ba chen po dang; lha'i spos dang /
translated: Then at that time Śatakratu, head of the gods, and the gods of the Thirty-Three threw down divine sandalwood powder, divine gold powder, divine mandārava flowers, great mandārava flowers, divine incense,

original: lha'i autpa la dang / ku mu ta dang / padma dkar po dang / lha'i rol mo'i sgra dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yang mchod cing /
analyzed: lha'i autpa la dang / ku mu ta dang / padma dkar po dang / lha'i rol mo'i sgra dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yang mchod cing /
translated: divine utpala, kumuda, and white lotus flowers, and divine music sounds to this perfection of wisdom,

original: bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la yang gtor /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la yang gtor /
translated: and they threw them on the Lord and on Mañjuśrī Kumārabhūta.

original: mngon par gtor nas 'di skad ces /
analyzed: mngon par gtor nas 'di skad ces /
translated: Having thrown them down, they said this:

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis gang dag phyag rgya 'dis btab pa de dag gis bla na med pa'i chos rin po che 'di mchod pa dang / phyi phyir zhing thos par gyur cig /🔽ces smras so //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis gang dag phyag rgya 'dis btab pa de dag gis bla na med pa'i chos rin po che 'di mchod pa dang / phyi phyir zhing thos par gyur cig /🔽ces smras so //
translated: “By this wholesome root, may those who are sealed with this seal worship this unsurpassed Dharma jewel and hear it again and again.”

original: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang tshig 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang tshig 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Śakra, Lord of the Gods, also said this:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: bdag gis kyang ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa'i bar gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dzambu'i gling 'dir spyod par 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa'i bar gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dzambu'i gling 'dir spyod par 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: I will strive to ensure that this profound perfection of wisdom, which is unborn and non-arisen, will be practiced in this Jambudvīpa, and that it will be heard by such sons of good family or

original: rigs kyi bu mo de 'dra ba de dag gi rna lam du grags par 'gyur ba nas de dag nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sgrub par 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i bar gyi slad du brtson par bgyi'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de 'dra ba de dag gi rna lam du grags par 'gyur ba nas de dag nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sgrub par 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i bar gyi slad du brtson par bgyi'o //
translated: daughters of good family, and that they will accomplish all the qualities of the Buddha.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di /🔽rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di / rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: this teaching of the perfection of wisdom🔽will be heard by sons of good family or

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi rna lam du tshegs chung ngus grags la /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi rna lam du tshegs chung ngus grags la /
translated: daughters of good family with little difficulty,🔽and

original: thos nas kyang mos pa dang / mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / 'chang ba'i bar du bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: thos nas kyang mos pa dang / mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / 'chang ba'i bar du bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Having heard it, they will be inspired; having been inspired, they will retain it, master it, and keep it.

original: rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis bdag cag gi 'di ni /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis bdag cag gi 'di ni /
translated: Those sons and daughters of good family should know that

original: lhas @162a *// bsgrubs pa'o //
analyzed: lhas @162a *// bsgrubs pa'o //
translated: this is accomplished by the gods.

original: zhes the tshom ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: zhes the tshom ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi'o //
translated: They should know this without doubt.

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;ko'u shi ka /
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;ko'u shi ka /
translated: Śakra, Lord of the Gods, having said this, the Blessed One said to him:

original: de de bzhin no //
analyzed: de de bzhin no //
translated: “Kauśika, it is so!

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'grub par blta'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'grub par blta'o //
translated: Those sons and daughters of good family should be seen as having accomplished all the qualities of the Buddha.

original: de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang nges par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang nges par shes par bya'o //
translated: They should be known as certain to attain unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then Mañjuśrī Kumārabhūta said to the Blessed One:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
translated: May the Blessed One bless this teaching of the perfection of wisdom for the sake of those sons of good family and daughters of good family.

original: bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: Blessed One,

original: byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
analyzed: byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
translated: please bless it.

original: tshig 'di smras ma thag tu de'i tshe skad cig de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi mthus sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g-yos par gyur to //
analyzed: tshig 'di smras ma thag tu de'i tshe skad cig de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi mthus sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g-yos par gyur to //
translated: As soon as these words were spoken, at that very moment, through the Buddha's power, the great earth shook in six ways.

original: sa chen po g-yos ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do //
analyzed: sa chen po g-yos ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do //
translated: Immediately after the great earth shook, at that time the Blessed One smiled.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis rlob pa na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis rlob pa na /
translated: As soon as the Blessed One smiled, at that time, when this teaching of the perfection of wisdom was being blessed by the Tathagata,

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to //
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to //
translated: this great trichiliocosm was filled with a great light.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then Mañjuśrī Kumārabhūta said this to the Blessed One:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di ni / de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di @162b byin gyis brlabs pa'i snga ltas lags so //
analyzed: 'di ni / de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di @162b byin gyis brlabs pa'i snga ltas lags so //
translated: these are the signs of the consecration of the Thus-Gone One’s teaching of the perfection of wisdom.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: 'jam dpal / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: 'jam dpal / de de bzhin no //
translated: “Mañjuśrī, it is so!

original: 'jam dpal / 'di dag ni /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / 'di dag ni /
translated: Mañjuśrī, these

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di byin gyis brlabs pa'i snga ltas rnams te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di byin gyis brlabs pa'i snga ltas rnams te /
translated: are the signs of the consecration of the teaching of the perfection of wisdom.

original: ltas 'di dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byin gyis brlabs par shes par bya'o //🔽'jam dpal / gang dag chos gang yang mi spong zhing mi bzlog la /
analyzed: ltas 'di dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byin gyis brlabs par shes par bya'o // 'jam dpal / gang dag chos gang yang mi spong zhing mi bzlog la /
translated: By these signs, you should know that the perfection of wisdom has been consecrated.🔽Mañjuśrī, those who do not reject or refute any phenomenon

original: bsngags par yang mi byed pa de dang de dag ni /
analyzed: bsngags par yang mi byed pa de dang de dag ni /
translated: and do not praise it

original: phyag rgya 'dis btab par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya 'dis btab par shes par bya'o //
translated: should be known as being sealed by this seal.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'jam dpal / dmigs pa yod na /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / dmigs pa yod na /
translated: Mañjuśrī, if there is an object,

original: spong bar byed pa dang / bsngags pa byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spong bar byed pa dang / bsngags pa byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: one will reject or praise it.

original: 'jam dpal / de lta bas na /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / de lta bas na /
translated: Mañjuśrī, therefore

original: gang dag rgya 'dis btab pa de dag gi ched du ngas rgya 'di bzhag ste /
analyzed: gang dag rgya 'dis btab pa de dag gi ched du ngas rgya 'di bzhag ste /
translated: For the sake of those who are sealed by this seal, I have set forth this seal.

original: 'di ltar / de dag gis thos nas kyang chos gang yang ston pa'am /
analyzed: 'di ltar / de dag gis thos nas kyang chos gang yang ston pa'am /
translated: Thus, having heard it, they do not teach any dharma at all,

original: rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: nor do they conceptualize.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'jam dpal / chos thams cad don dam par ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / chos thams cad don dam par ma skyes pa'i phyir ro // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang /
translated: Mañjuśrī, it is because ultimately all dharmas are unborn.

original: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
analyzed: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
translated: When the Blessed One had spoken thus, the youthful Mañjuśrī, those bodhisattva mahāsattvas, those great hearers, and the world with its gods, humans, asuras, and gandharvas rejoiced and praised the Blessed One's words.

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya pa rdzogs so ////
translated: The noble Perfection of Wisdom in Seven Hundred Lines is complete.

original: skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o ////
analyzed: skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o ////
translated: It has been edited and finalized with new terminology.
